definitions.definition: A small recessed area set off from a larger room .

examples: The house was situated in a leafy alcove .

definitions.definition: The geographical and geological term for a steep-sided hollow in the side of an exposed rock face or cliff of a homogeneous rock type, that was water eroded.

main_definition: ( architecture ) A small recessed area set off from a larger room .
secondary_definitions: ( countable ) The geographical and geological term for a steep-sided hollow in the side of an exposed rock face or cliff of a homogeneous rock type, that was water eroded.
